entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Core 3.1 ambiguous call when extending an interface from a nuget package #22836
  • Respect property to disable targeting pack caching for runtime build #22834
  • When I get the default value of the method parameter as `long` through reflection, the result is `DbNull` instead of `0` #22829
  • testhost exited with error: Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #22828

Closed

  • `Version string portion was too short or too long` error while installing dotnet-dev-certs #22734

PullRequests

Created

  • Update build.yml to change the loc build to target .2xx #22835
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Merged missed Version.Details.xml source-build changes from release/6.0.1xx #22833
    Area-Infrastructure, source-build
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22825
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 3.1.122 #22824
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merge pull request #22284 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-parallelnonwindows #22722
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Blazor AoT Publish Integration Tests #22682
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE
  • Use Environment.Process{Path,Id} & delete wrappers #22759
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded TFM to the current framework #22805
    Area-FSharp
  • Update Test project x64SolutionBuild to current framework #22532
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project XunitMulti to current framework #22770
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
